original_text: Do not join with wicked or evil people. Do not do the things that they do. Do not join with wicked or evil people. Do not do the things that they do.
korean_text: 사악한 자의 길에 들어가지 말며 악인의 길로 다니지 말지어다

sentences.original_text: Do not join with wicked or evil people
Do not do the things that they do
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 하는 행동을 따라 하지 말라

sentences.original_text: Do not join with wicked or evil people
Do not do the things that they do
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 하는 행동을 따라 하지 말라
